front.title: PCEP Extensions for Establishing Relationships Between Sets of LSPs

abstract.t: This document introduces a generic mechanism to create a grouping of LSPs in the context of a PCE. This grouping can then be used to define associations between sets of LSPs or between a set of LSPs and a set of attributes (such as configuration parameters or behaviors), and is equally applicable to stateful PCE (active and passive modes) and stateless PCE.
